headline: Legal Probe And Weak Momentum Contrast With Charles River Valuation Upside
summary: Shareholder rights counsel has launched an investigation into Charles River Laboratories International, Inc. (NYSE:CRL) regarding potential breaches of fiduciary duties by certain officers and directors. The review focuses on whether management actions properly aligned with shareholder interests and complied with corporate governance obligations. This inquiry adds a legal and governance angle to existing investor concerns around the company. For investors watching NYSE:CRL, this...
